## spore-kit-cookie

# Cookie相关工具函数

### Examples

```javascript
// 统一引入 spore-kit
var $kit = require('spore-kit');
console.info($kit.cookie.cookie);

// 单独引入 spore-kit-cookie
var $cookie = require('spore-kit-cookie');
console.info($cookie.cookie);

// 单独引入一个工具对象
var $cookie = require('spore-kit-cookie/cookie');
```
